detailsOfAchievement: Established in 2013 during a Workshop organised by Bihar Government under the guidance of Tripurari Sharma and Asif Ali Haidar from NSD, Kedar Nath Pandey, Ajit Ganguly by and under the Chairmanship of Mrityunjay Sharma youth theatre dirctor of Patna. Participate in many social concern function along with other organisation during 2013-14 and looking for drama production. After establishment on 26 May 2014 Pagal written by Prabodh Joshi and directed by Mrityunjay Sharma was the first drama presentation by the group. After that a festival named Theatrewala Natyotsav 2014 organised in the first punytithi of Ajit Ganguly. In this festival group celebrate two day drama festival in which Gungi and Anath stories of Tagore performed by the same group directed by Mrityunjay Sharma. One person NSD graduate Randhir Kumar awarded Theatrewala Youth Award by the group by Alok Dhanwa, KN Pandey and Parwez Akhtar. Another ocassion for group is Inna ki Awaz staged two days 26-27 May 2015 on the occassion of anniversary celebration of Sugam sahitya sanchar samiti written by Ashghar Wazahat and directed by Mrityunjay Sharma. After that 2nd Theatrewala Natyotsav 2015 again organized by the group. This year its four day drama festival and recognized as Youth directors festival from the Patna. In this festival we staged again Pagal with other guest teams staged their plays ei joote, chup kyon hain and naksalwadi. In this festival Theatrewala Yuva Samman 2015 given to youth actor director Manoj Manav from Patna by the group. Till date after achievement group works in the art and culture area with social concern and todays issues outstanding as per our belief. We are very optimist with our mission in art and culture, folk form of state and cultural heritage of the state. Our team is outstanding under the Chairmanship of MLC and literal personality Kedar Nath Pandey, Secretary, Noopur Chkraborty, Artist like Rajan Kumar Singh, Amit Shrivastava, Sarita Sharma and many youth join the group smoothly to improve their profession skills in art and culture and basically a good, sensitive, literal, secular human beings uner the Direction of Mrityunjay Sharma, youth writer director.

isuues.name: Key Issues
isuues.value: Animal Husbandry, Dairying & Fisheries,Agriculture,Art & Culture,Dalit Upliftment,Education & Literacy,Information & Communication Technology,Legal Awareness & Aid,Labour & Employment,Micro Small & Medium Enterprises,New & Renewable Energy,Panchayati Raj,Right to Information & Advocacy,Rural Development & Poverty Alleviation,Science & Technology,Urban Development & Poverty Alleviation,Vocational Training,Women's Development & Empowerment,Youth Affairs

detailsOfAchievement: Rashtriya Computer Saksharta Mission an institution who has played a significant role in promoting skill development programme spread over the country. Our main focus was to prepare computer skilled human capital and we did it. Our training activities as we successfully prepared more or less lakhs participants within the various parts of the country. RCSM an autonomous institution registered under the Public Trust Act, is purely a non-profitable organisation working on the grounds of spreading Computer Literacy. Established with the sole view of imparting computer literacy and creating job opportunities for the under privileged. RCSM today stands apart from all other institutions for its noble motive and its service to the society.This is also one of the reasons why RCSM is known as the pioneers of Computer Literacy throughout the country. RCSM is the premier organisation in the field of computer literacy campaign across the country. The popularity of RCSM is self explanatory that so, many institutions has been following the foot-print of RCSM so, it will not be any exaggeration to say RCSM IS THE MOTHER OF COMPUTER LITERACY MISSION. Since its inception,RCSM has been working towards its goal with the same zeal and enthusiasm and taking up a challenge every year to cover a fixed number of aspirants to be benefited and each time it has crossed much over its expectations. Under The guidance of experienced teachers the RCSM started providing computer literacy at a very low cost. Within a few years, thousands of training centres were opened across the country. it has a credit of training lacs of aspirants through its Authorised Education Centres spread across the Country that includes not only students but also housewives, businessmen, employees and almost every sections of the society. Today most of our students who had elected RCSM as their platform for putting their first foot forward in the world of Computers are highly placed in reputed organisations in India and abroad

detailsOfAchievement: 1. We conducted On Site Education Programme in Meskaur & Kashichak block of Nawada district with the support of Bihar Education Project, Nawada under Brick Klin Project. 2. We are forming Women SHG at the Naubatpur block of Patna district with the support of NABARD. At present we have formed 50 groups & all the groups have been linked to Bank. 3. We conducted training on Tailoring under Skill Development Programme of Nabard in Naubatpur block of Patna District of Bihar. 4. We have formed about 250 girls club in 15 girls colleges of Bihar. 5. We are conducting a Working Women Hostle in Patna district of Bihar with the support of Central & Bihar Social Welfare Board. 6. We are publishing quarterly VEERANGANA a social magazine based on Women Empowerment. 7. We have conducted three unit Awareness Generation Programme in Jehanabad district of Bihar with the support of Central Social Welfare Board 8. We have done Quality testing & mapping Of Water with the support of Envirotech East Pvt Ltd. On behalf of PHEd Bihar in Kishanganj, Sitamarhi, Sheohar & Madhubani district of Bihar. 9. We have conducted Four days survey & training programme on Education named as ASER with the support of PRATHAM Mumbai in Kishanganj district of Bihar. In this survey we were covered 31 government school to know the status of education and facility & appearance of student in the school. 10. We are conducting Three Non Formal Education (NFE) centers with the support of members contribution in the Naubatpur block of Patna district where the children of SHG members get elementary education. 11. We are conducting Fluoride/Arsenic removal Kiosk in Gaya, Sasaram, Nawada, Shekhpura & Lakhisarai district of Bihar with the support of Envirotech East Pvt. Ltd. on behalf of PHED Bihar. 12. We are forming girls Club in the colleges of Bihar. The name of the formed club is SAMBHAWANA. 13. We are forming Self Help Group in Kako, Ratnifaridpur, Sadar block and providing skill development training on Tailoring in Modanganj, Ratanifaridpur & Hulasganj block of Jehanabad district with the support of DRDA, Jehanabad. 14. We organized a one day workshop on Right to Education with the support of Voluntary Forum for Education under United Nations Millennium Campaign in Jehanabad district of Bihar.. 15. We were participated in Women empowerment programme of Dainik Jagran SAPNO KO CHALI CHHONEâ€¦.. which was organized by Jagrn Pahal, Women Development Corporation & UNFPA in 21 Girls colleges of Six district of Bihar.
